item.title: Bangalore to Udupi Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Udupi can be a delightful experience, as you'll get to explore the pristine beaches, ancient temples and delicious cuisine of this coastal town in Karnataka. Udupi is one of the top tourist attractions in Karnataka and has various educational institutions. It is notable for the Krishna Temple and is also known as the temple city.[3] It also lends its
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
